Imports

shared, singlexml

Types

SingleLineBool = bool
The type of the argument singleLine in parse procs. When marggersSingleLineStaticBool is defined, this will be static. This could lead to slightly faster code, but a larger binary.   Source Edit 
DelimFinishReason = enum
  frDone, frReachedEnd, frFailed
  Source Edit

Procs

proc parseCurly(parser: MarggersParserVar): NativeString {...}{.raises: [], tags: [].}

Parses a curly bracket element.

If -d:marggersCurlyNoHtmlEscape is defined, initial ! characters are ignored and no HTML chars are escaped.

  Source Edit
